<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, in consideration of the respective covenants
	and agreements set forth herein, the Parties hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	1
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Definitions
	and Interpretation
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.1.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Interpretation
</U>
	.
	In this Agreement, except to the extent specifically provided otherwise:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&ldquo;or&rdquo; is not exclusive (unless the context implies otherwise);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&ldquo;including&rdquo; means &ldquo;including&rdquo; without limitation;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	terms defined in the singular have the same meanings when used in the plural and
<I>
	vice versa
</I>
	;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	words importing any gender include the other gender;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(v)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	references to statutes or regulations include all statutory or regulatory provisions consolidating,
	amending or replacing the statute or regulation referred to;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(vi)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	a reference to any Person includes such Person's successors and permitted assignees;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(vii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any reference to &ldquo;days&rdquo; means calendar days unless Business Days are expressly specified;
	references to &ldquo;calendar&rdquo; means the Gregorian calendar;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(viii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Schedules identified in this Agreement are incorporated herein by reference and made a part
	hereof for all purposes; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ix)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the headings herein are for convenience only, do not constitute a part of this Agremeent and shall
	not be deemed to affect or limit any of the provisions hereof.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.2.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Definitions
</U>
	. The
	following terms and expressions shall have the following meanings when used in this Agreement and not expressly or contrary defined
	in the body of this instrument:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Control
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;means, when used with respect to any Person (&ldquo;
<U>
	Controlled Person
</U>
	&rdquo;), (i) the power, held by another Person, alone or together with other Persons bound by a voting or similar agreement (each a &ldquo;
<U>
	Controlling Person
</U>
	&rdquo;), to elect, directly or indirectly, the majority of the senior management and to establish and conduct the policies and management of the relevant Controlled Person, whether individually or jointly with Affiliates of the Controlling Person(s); or (ii) the direct or indirect ownership by a Controlling Person and its Affiliates, alone or together with another Controlling Person and its Affiliates, of at least fifty percent (50%) plus one (1) share/quota representing the voting stock of the Controlled Person. Terms derived from Control, such as &ldquo;
<U>
	Controlled
</U>
	&rdquo;, &ldquo;
<U>
	Controlling
</U>
	&rdquo; and &ldquo;
<U>
	under common Control
</U>
	&rdquo; shall have a similar meaning to Control.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Defense
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	shall have the meaning set forth in Section 7.5.1.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Seller&rsquo; Indemnified Parties
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	shall have the meaning set forth in Section 7.2.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Termination Agreement
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	means the Termination Agreement executed by and between the Parties, ABI and the Company on the date hereof.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Third Party Claim
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	shall have the meaning set forth in Section 7.4.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Transaction
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	means the signing and delivery of the Transaction Agreements and all of the transactions contemplated by the respective Transaction Agreements, including: (i)&nbsp;the sale of the Purchased Shares by the Seller to the Purchaser in accordance with this Agreement; and (ii)&nbsp;the performance by the Seller and the Purchaser of their respective obligations under the Transaction Agreements and the exercise by the Seller and the Purchaser of their respective rights under the Transaction Agreements.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-LEFT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&ldquo;
<U>
	Transaction Agreements
</U>
	&rdquo;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT: SILVER 1PT SOLID; BORDER-BOTTOM: SILVER 1PT SOLID; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4PT; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	means the following agreements: (a) this Agreement; (b) the Termination Agreement; (c) Second Amendment to the Rental Agreement; (d) the minutes of Shareholders Meeting and Board of Directors Meeting of the Company approving the agenda mentioned in Sections 3.2.(ii) and 3.2.(iii); and (e) the First Amendment to the Share Services Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	1.3.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<U>
	Negotiation
</U>
	. The
	Parties hereto, each represented by legal counsel, have negotiated this Agreement, which is not an adhesion contract.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	2&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Purpose
	of the Agreement
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.1.
<B>
	&#9;
</B>
<U>
	Sale and Purchase
</U>
	. On the
	date hereof, the Seller hereby agrees to sell, transfer and deliver to the Purchaser, and the Purchaser hereby agrees to acquire
	and accept from the Seller fifity thousand (50.000) shares (i.e., the entire and total number of shares owned by the Seller) issued
	by the Company free and clear of any and all Liens, corresponding to fifty percent (50%) of the capital stock of the Company (&ldquo;
<U>
	Purchased
	Shares
</U>
	&rdquo;), together with all rights inherent thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&#9;2.1.1.&#9;With the closing of this Transaction,
	Purchaser hereby represents that it will be the owner of shares representing 100% of the capital stock of the Companyfree and clear
	of any and all Liens.
<FONT STYLE="BACKGROUND-COLOR: YELLOW">
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<B>
	&#9;
</B>
	2.1.2.&#9;On the Closing Date, the
	Purchased Shares will be transferred to the Purchaser free and clear of any and all Liens with everything they represent (including
	any right to dividends pending payment by the Company and respective equity interest in the Company).
<B>
	&#9;
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 7; VALUE: 2 -->

	&nbsp;

<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.2.&#9;
<U>
	Purchase Price
</U>
	. The purchase price
	to be paid by the Purchaser to Seller for the Purchased Shares is R$ 50.000,00 (fifty thousand reais) (&ldquo;
<U>
	Purchase Price
</U>
	&rdquo;).
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.3.&#9;
<U>
	Payment of the Purchase Price
</U>
	. The Purchase Price
	shall be paid by Purchaser to Seller by bank wire transfer in immediately available funds to the following account: .
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	2.4.&#9;
<U>
	Receipt, Release and Discharge
</U>
	.
	Proof of deposit of the amounts contemplated in this Section 2 shall serve as a receipt for all legal purposes and effects, and
	constitute full, general and irrevocable release and discharge granted by the Seller in favor of the Purchaser, with waiver of
	all claims the Seller may have with respect to the (i) amount reflected in the proof of deposit and (ii) any claim in relation
	to the purchase price, its share value and the ful control of the company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	3&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Closing
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3.1.&#9;
<U>
	Closing
</U>
	. The closing of the transactions
	contemplated by this Agreement (the &ldquo;
<U>
	Closing
</U>
	&rdquo;) will take place no later than five (5) days after the approval
	of the Antitrust Authority, as set forth in Section 9.1 of this Agreement, on the same location of the execution of this Agreement
	or at any other place and time mutually agreed by the Parties (the &ldquo;
<U>
	Closing Date
</U>
	&rdquo;). All transactions and other
	actions taken, and all documents delivered, at the Closing will be deemed to occur simultaneously as of the close of business of
	this date.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3.2.&#9;The following documents shall be executed
	by the Parties, ABI and/or the Company, as applicable, on the Closing Date:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Minutes of Shareholders Meeting of the Company (i)&nbsp;approving the transfer of the headquarter
	of the Company to other location; (ii)&nbsp;approving the change in the Company&rsquo;s corporate name; (iii) acknowledging the
	resignation of the members of the Board of Directors and of the Executive Committee appointed by Seller; and (iv) appointing the
	members of the Board of Directors of the Company that shall replace the members that have resigned, substantially in the form attached
	hereto as
<U>
	Schedule 3.2(i)
</U>
	;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Minutes of Board of Directors Meetings of the Company appointing the new member of the Executive
	Committee of the Company, substantially in the form attached hereto as Schedule 3.2(ii);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	Resignation Letter of the members of the Board of Directors and Executive Committee of the Company
	appointed by Seller;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	3.3.&#9;In addition to entering into the documents
	set forth in Section 3.2 above, on the Closing Date:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the Seller shall transfer to the Purchaser the Purchased Shares free of all Liens, by means of
	signing the relevant Book of Transfer of Nominative Shares (
<I>
	Livro de Registro de Transfer&ecirc;ncia de A&ccedil;&otilde;es
	Nominativas
</I>
	) of the Company;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	the legal representative of the Company shall record such transfer with the Book of Register of
	Nominative Shares (
<I>
	Livro de Registro de A&ccedil;&otilde;es Nominativas
</I>
	); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;

</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">

	the Purchaser shall transfer the Purchase Price to the Seller, in accordance with Section 2.3.
	above.

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	4&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Representations
	and Warranties of the Seller
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Seller hereby represents and warrants to the
	Purchaser that as of the date of signing of this Agreement and the Closing Date:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.1.&#9;
<U>
	Validity and Execution
</U>
	. The Seller
	has full legal right, as well as all necessary capacity and power and, where applicable, has taken all actions and approvals required
	to enter into, execute and deliver this Agreement, the Transaction Agreements and to fully perform its obligations hereunder and
	thereunder. The Seller has the unrestricted right to sell, endorse, assign and transfer the Purchased Shares pursuant to this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 28.35PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.1.1.&#9;This Agreement, the Transaction
	Agreements, assignments and other instruments to be executed pursuant to the Transaction are valid, binding and enforceable obligations
	of the Seller who is the sole lawful owner and holder of the Purchased Shares by good, valid and transferable title, free and clear
	of any Liens.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 28.35PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.2.&#9;
<U>
	Governmental Approvals and Notifications
</U>
	.
	Except for the approval of the Antitrust Authority, pursuant to Section 9.1 below, no notification, authorization, consent, approval,
	license, exemption of, or filing or registration with, any Government Entity in Brazil is or will be necessary for the execution
	of the Agreement, the other Transaction Agreements, and for the performance by the Seller of its obligations under this Agreement
	or any other Transaction Agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.3.&#9;
<U>
	No Conflict or Violation
</U>
	. Except
	for the approval of the Antitrust Authority, pursuant to Section 9.1 below, the signing, formalization, delivery and/or performance
	of this Agreement and the other Transaction Agreements to which the Seller is a party, the consummation of the Transaction, the
	fulfillment of the terms hereof and thereof, and the compliance with any of the provisions hereof and thereof do not and will not:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	conflict with or result in a breach or violation of the Organizational Documents of the Company;
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	conflict with or violate any Order or Brazilian Law applicable to the Seller or any of its properties
	or assets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.4.&#9;
<U>
	Litigation
</U>
	. There is no Claim or
	action or proceeding (before or by any court, tribunal or administrative, governmental or regulatory body, agency, commission,
	division, department, public body or other Governmental Authority) pending or, to the best knowledge of the Seller, threatened
	against or affecting the Seller the outcome of which would in any manner&nbsp;impair the ability of the Seller to perform its obligations
	under this Agreement or any other Transaction Agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	4.5.
<U>
	No Other Representations or Warranties
</U>
	.
	Except for the representations and warranties contained in this Agreement, the Seller makes no other express or implied representation
	or warranty with respect to the Seller or to the Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>

<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	9
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage250"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	5&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Representations
	and Warranties of the Purchaser and ABI
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	The Purchaser and ABI hereby jointly represent
	and warrant to the Seller that as of the date of signing of this Agreement and the Closing Date:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.1&#9;
<U>
	Organization
</U>
	. Purchaser is a limited
	company duly organized, validly existing and in good standing under the Laws of Brazil. ABI is a corporation orgazined, validly
	existing and in good standing under the Laws of Delaware, United States of America.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.2.&#9;
<U>
	Corporate Actions
</U>
	. The Purchaser
	and ABI have the full legal right, as well as all necessary capacity and power as a legal entity, and have taken all actions and
	approvals required to enter into, execute and deliver this Agreement and the Transaction Agrements, as well as to fully perform
	their obligations hereunder and thereunder.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 28.35PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.2.1.&#9;The Transaction has been duly approved
	by the directors, officers and/or managers of the Purchaser and ABI, as applicable, and there is no other corporate action or authorization
	required to enter into and to perform the Transaction and the obligations hereunder. The Purchaser and ABI have all requisite power
	to own and hold their assets, as well as to carry out their activities as they are currently carried out.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 28.35PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 28.35PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.2.2.&#9;The legal representatives of the
	Purchaser and of ABI executing this Agreement have all required powers for that purpose and, therefore, this Agreement, the other
	Transaction Agreements and each one of the other agreements and instruments executed by the Purchaser and ABI in connection with
	this Agreement and the remaining Transaction Agreements, are valid and binding obligations of the Purchaser and of ABI, enforceable
	against them in accordance with their terms.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 28.35PT; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.3.&#9;
<U>
	Governmental Approvals and Notifications
</U>
	.
	Except for the approval of the Antitrust Authority, pursuant to Section 9.1, no notification, authorization, consent, approval,
	license, exemption of, or filing or registration with, any court, tribunal or administrative, governmental or regulatory body,
	agency, commission, division, department, public body or other Governmental Authority in Brazil, in United States of America or
	in another country, is or will be necessary for the execution of this Agreement, the other Transaction Agreements, and for the
	performance by the Purchaser or by ABI of their obligations under this Agreement or any Transaction Agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.4.&#9;
<U>
	No Conflict or Violation
</U>
	. Except
	for the approval of the Antitrust Authority, pursuant to Section 9.1 below, the signing, formalization and performance of this
	Agreement and the other Transaction Agreements to which the Purchaser and ABI are parties, the consummation of the Transaction,
	the fulfillment of the terms hereof and thereof, and the compliance with any of the provisions do not and will not:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	conflict with or result in a breach or violation of the Purchaser&rsquo;s and ABI&rsquo;s Organizational
	Documents; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	conflict with or violate any Order or Law applicable to the Purchaser or to ABI or any of their
	properties or assets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 10; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
<!-- FIELD: SEQUENCE; TYPE: ARABIC; NAME: PAGENO -->
	10
<!-- FIELD: /SEQUENCE -->
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage251"></A>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.5.&#9;
<U>
	Litigation
</U>
	. There is no Claim or
	action or proceeding (before or by any court, tribunal or administrative, governmental or regulatory body, agency, commission,
	division, department, public body or other Governmental Authority) pending or, to the best knowledge of the Purchaser and ABI,
	threatened against or affecting the Purchaser or ABI, the outcome of which would in any manner impair the ability of the Purchaser
	and/or ABI to perform their obligations under this Agreement and the other Transaction Agreements.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.6.&#9;
<U>
	Financial Strength
</U>
	. The Purchaser
	has the financial strength and resources to enter into this Agreement and to consummate the transactions contemplated herein, under
	the terms and conditions provided for in this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	5.7.&#9;
<U>
	Condition of the Company
</U>
	. Purchaser
	and ABI hereby represent that they have joint Control of the Company and effective partipate in the Company&rsquo;s management
	and, as a consequence, are fully aware of the current condition (including, without limitation, the business, financial, solvency,
	accounting, fiscal, legal condition) of the Company, acquiring the Purchased Shares on an &ldquo;as is&rdquo; basis.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	6&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Other
	Covenants
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1.&#9;
<U>
	Transfer of Assets
</U>
	. The Purchaser and ABI hereby
	undertake to transfer the Assets located in the Property to other location within twelve (12) months as of the Closing Date. Purchaser
	shall within thirty (30) days as of the Closing Date, provide to Seller a time table of the transfer of the Assets, evidencing
	the measures to be taken in order to transfer the Assets within such 12-months term. In case the Purchaser and ABI do not comply
	with their obligation set forth in this Section 6.1, the Purchaser, ABI and the Company shall be subject to a penalty of R$ 1.500,00
	(one thousand and five hundred reais) per day, without prejudice to the rental amount owed by the Company to the Seller and to
	any other measure that may be taken by Seller to guarantee the compliance by Purchaser and ABI of their obligation set forth herein.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1.1. &#9;In case Purchaser and ABI do not comply with their obligation
	of transfer of the Assets located in the Property, pursuant to Section 6.1 above, without prejudice to any other right of Seller,
	including the daily penalty set forth in Section 6.1 above, Seller shall have the right to take all measures necessary to transfer
	the Company&rsquo;s Assets to other location (a deposit or the Company&rsquo;s new headquarter) and Purchaser, ABI and the Company
	shall be responsible for all costs and expenses arising therefrom.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.1.2.&#9;For sake of clarity, following Purchaser&rsquo;s request,
	the foundation of the work site located at the Property shall not be transferred by the Purchaser, ABI and the Company to other
	location and no payment from either Party shall be due with respect to that.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.2.&#9;
<U>
	Rental Agreement
</U>
	. The Parties, the Company and ABI
	expressly acknowledge that the lease provided for in the Rental Agreement, as amended, was agreed to by the Parties, the Company
	and ABI in light of the JV and the Parties agreed to amend the term of the rental to twelve (12) months as of the Closing Date
	in order to allow the Company to transfer its Assets to other location. In this regard, the Parties hereby declare and agree that
	the lease contained in the Rental Agreement, as amended, will under no circumstances be subject to any renewal rights.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
</P>
<!-- FIELD: PAGE; SEQUENCE: 11; VALUE: 2 -->
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 6PT; BORDER-BOTTOM: BLACK 4PT SOLID">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">

	11

<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE: ALWAYS; MARGIN-TOP: 6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</DIV>
<!-- FIELD: /PAGE -->
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	6.3.&#9;Purchaser, ABI and the Company shall,
	within forty five (45) days as of the Closing Date, update and/or cancel, as applicable, the Company&rsquo;s register with the
	proper Governmental Authorities (including but not limited to Federal Revenue, State Reventue, Municipality, Cetesb) due to the
	transfer of the Company&rsquo;s headquarter to other location.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<B>
	Section
	7&nbsp;
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-VARIANT: SMALL-CAPS">
<U>
	Indemnification
</U>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	7.1.&#9;
<U>
	Indemnification by the Seller
</U>
	.
	The Seller shall indemnify Purchaser, the Company, ABI and its Affiliates (the &ldquo;
<U>
	Purchaser Indemnified Parties
</U>
	&rdquo;),
	against, and shall hold them harmless from and reimburse the same for and in respect of, any and all Losses actually suffered or
	incurred by the Purchaser Indemnified Parties arising out of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any inaccuracy, error, imprecision, insufficiency, violation, or unthruth, hidden contigency or
	breach of any representation or warranty made by the Seller under this Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	breach or failure to perform, either total or in part, any covenant, obligation or undertaking
	of the Seller pursuant to this Agreement or any other Transaction Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(iii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any obligation of Seller or any of its Affiliates (other than the Company) or any other entity
	in which the Seller invests or invested in, which is charged against the Purchaser Indemnified Parties, regardless if such Claim
	is caused by an act, fact, event or omission on, before or after the date hereof; and/or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(iv)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	acts, facts, omissions related to the Company occurred on and before the Closing Date, except for
	Losses related to taxes due in connection with the acquisition and/or ownership of the Assets by the Company, which shall be solely
	and exclusively Purchaser&rsquo;s responsibility/liability.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	7.1.1.&#9;The Purchased Shares are being transferred to Purchaser
	on an &ldquo;as is&rdquo; basis. Therefore the Seller makes no representation or warranty to the Purchaser or ABI as to the current,
	past and future situation, solvency, financial, business or other condition of the Company, or as to the results of its operations,
	and, accordingly, Seller shall not be liable under any circumstance to indemnify or keep Purchaser Indemnified Parties harmless
	for and against any liabilities and obligations of any nature of the Company, whether or not reflected, provisioned or reserved
	on the consolidated or unconsolidated financial statements of the Company, whether accrued or fixed, known or unknown, absolute
	or contingent, matured or unmatured, determined or determinable, disclosed or undisclosed, including those arising under or in
	connection with any law or order and those arising under or in connection with any contract, agreement, arrangement, commitment
	or undertaking or any alleged or actual violation or breach thereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	7.2.&#9;
<U>
	Indemnification by Purchaser and ABI
</U>
	.
	Purchaser and ABI shall indemnify the Seller and its Affiliates (&ldquo;
<U>
	Seller&rsquo;s Indemnified Parties
</U>
	&rdquo;) against,
	and shall hold them harmless from and reimburse the same for and in respect of, any and all Losses actually suffered or incurred
	by the Seller&rsquo;s Indemnified Parties arising out of:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; TEXT-INDENT: 0IN; MARGIN: 0PT 0">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT">
<TR STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 0">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 28.35PT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	any breach or inaccuracy of representations or warranties of Purchaser and/or ABI made in this
	Agreement or in any other Transaction Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
